snippet: Mr. Trump’s dual speeches in Mexico City and Phoenix were so jarring that his true vision and intentions on immigration were hard to discern....
abstract: Donald Trump travels to Mexico for joint news conference with Pres Enrique Pena Nieto to remake his image on divisive issue of immigration hours before heading to Phoenix, where he renewed his promise to build wall and make Mexico pay for it; his two speeches are so jarring that his true vision and intentions on immigration are hard to discern.

byline.contributor: Azam Ahmed and Nick Corasaniti contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump’s dual speeches in Mexico City and Phoenix were so jarring that his true vision and intentions on immigration were hard to discern.

headline.main: Donald Trump Gambles on Immigration but Sends Conflicting Signals
headline.print_headline: Trump Gambles on Immigration in Trip and Rally
